quoteText: If any provision of these Terms is found by a court of competent jurisdiction to be invalid, you and Fivestars nevertheless agree that the court should endeavor to give effect to Fivestarsâ€™ intentions as reflected in the provision, and the other provisions of these Terms remain in full force and effect.
title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

tosdr.case: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
